name: Plant'rMan
description:
World has sufferings, deaths, floods, climate change, etc. The world is unhappy! You are a Planter Man, you own a shop. People come to you, they ask you for their beloved plant. Your duty is to plant them and give it to them!

INSTRUCTIONS
How to plant Drag and Drop the seed and place them inside the pot ---------------------------------------------------------------------
The first seed is Tulsi/Basil
The second seed is Rose
The third seed is Ebony

  • Drag the pot and hand it over to the customer after the plant is fully grown.

    • Your goal is to fill up the metre till it is full.




    IMPORTANT!

    Every time you plant something, some of your happiness is utilized, so beware!
    If a person goes out without a plant, then he is unhappy and the metre goes down!


    NOTE!

    On Downloaded versions for Window, toggle between fullscreen by pressing Shift+F
